fields.label: Role per Amount Spent rules
fields.name: wcra_rules
fields.instructions: Here you can configure role(s) assignement by amounts spent by user during the selected time periods. Lower ruels have higher priority this is important when you are using the remove previous roles before assigning the new ones option.

sub_fields.label: Rule name / id
sub_fields.name: wcra_rule_name_id
sub_fields.instructions: Type a rule name / id to better identify the rule

sub_fields.label: Unique id
sub_fields.name: wcra_unique_id
sub_fields.instructions: Ignore this field, is automatically assigned by the plugin once the rule is saved.

sub_fields.label: Time period type
sub_fields.name: wcra_time_period_type
sub_fields.instructions:
You can choose to set multiple fixed time periods (setting start date and end date) or a dynamic period.

Using the dynamic type you can defined a time range that goes from "now" to the last n Minutes/Horus/Days/Months/Years where n is the time span. (EX.: Last 3 months, or last 7 days and so on).

sub_fields.label: Dates
sub_fields.name: wcra_dates
sub_fields.instructions:
Date rules have priority that goes bottom-up. Lower rules have higher priority

Date rules with starting time greater than "now" are ignored

sub_fields.label: Would you like to compute role assignment during a different period?
sub_fields.name: wcra_compute_role_assignment_during_different_period
sub_fields.instructions: By default the role assignment is computed during the configured starting and ending date. You can optionally decide to compute role assignment during a different date.

sub_fields.label: Email notification
sub_fields.name: wcra_email_notification
sub_fields.instructions: Optionally you can send an email to the user to allowing him to now about the role change.

sub_fields.label: Email subject
sub_fields.name: wcra_notification_email_subject
sub_fields.instructions: Subject of the notification email that will sent to the user once the role(s) has been assigned.

sub_fields.label: Email text
sub_fields.name: wcra_notification_email_text
sub_fields.instructions: Text of the notification email that will sent to the user once the role(s) has been assigned.

sub_fields.label: Role(s) restriction
sub_fields.name: wcra_role_restriction
sub_fields.instructions: You can restrict role assignment selecting to which user role(s) the rules can be applied. Only Customers belonging to that role(s) can be assigned the new role according to the amount spent. Leave unselected to have no restriction.

sub_fields.label: Product(s) restriction
sub_fields.name: wcra_products_restriction
sub_fields.instructions: Rule can be applied only to amount spent to buy the selected item(s).

sub_fields.label: Category(ies) restriction
sub_fields.name: wcra_categories_restriction
sub_fields.instructions: Rule can be applied only to amount spent on item beloging to the selected category(ies).

sub_fields.label: Assignment strategy
sub_fields.name: wcra_selected_strategy
sub_fields.instructions: You can assign a scheduling rule to selected item(s)/category(ies) or to all excluding the selected ones.

sub_fields.label: Children categories
sub_fields.name: wcra_categories_children
sub_fields.instructions: If at least one category has been selected, you can decide to apply the scheduling rule also to children categories items

choices.all_children: Apply to selected categories and all its children

sub_fields.label: Minimum amount
sub_fields.name: wcra_amount
sub_fields.instructions: Minimum amout excluding taxes spent during the period(s) . If the customer has spent more that this value he will be assigned the selected role(s).

sub_fields.label: Max amount
sub_fields.name: wcra_max_amount
sub_fields.instructions: Total maximum amout excluding taxes spent during the period(s) . Can be left empty or 0 to have no limit.

sub_fields.label: Role(s) to assign
sub_fields.name: wcra_roles_to_assign
sub_fields.instructions: Select which role(s) assign to the customer who have spent the amount during the periods

sub_fields.label: Remove old role(s) before assign the new one(s)
sub_fields.name: wcra_remove_old_roles_before_assign_the_new_ones
sub_fields.instructions: Selecting Yes all the current user roles will be removed and then assigned the selected ones.

sub_fields.label: Which roles have to be removed
sub_fields.name: wcra_which_roles_have_to_be_removed

sub_fields.label: Role(s) removal if amount spent doesn't match
sub_fields.name: wcra_roles_removal
sub_fields.instructions:
If the user has already associated one (or more) role assigned by the rule, it will be removed if the amount spent during the configured periods doesn't match the rule. Select No to leave his roles unchanged though the rule doesn't match.

Select the Selected ones option to remove specific roles.

In case after removing the selected roles the user will have no roles assigned, the plugin will assign the base Customer role.

 

IMPORTANT NOTE: Roles are computed after an order placement or an order status update. If none of this events happen, role(s) are NOT recomputed and then they are NOT eventually removed. To force role reassignment use the Role re-calculator tool.

sub_fields.label: Which roles have to be removed
sub_fields.name: wcra_which_roles_have_to_be_removed_after_expiration

fields.label: Automatic role recomputation
fields.name: wcra_automatic_role_recomputation
fields.instructions: Role(s) assignement check by default it's only performed after an order has been placed, after it has been edited/saved or its status has been changed in the admin area. However You can automatize this operation by choosing a time interval span after which check is regularly performed.

fields.label: Recomputation frequency - quantity
fields.name: wcra_time_quantity
fields.instructions: Define the time span after which the roles are recoputed. For example: Every 2 hours,Every 30 Days, etc.

fields.label: Starting from - hour
fields.name: wcra_start_hour
fields.instructions: Once the options are saved, the automatic role recoputation will start at the time specified in the following fields. For example if you set 22:00, the recoputation will start its first run today at 22:00 and it will continue according to the frequency settings.

fields.label: Exclude orders by status
fields.name: wcra_exclude_orders_by_status
fields.instructions: The plugin will consider only orders with the selected statuses to compute roles by amount spent or by product.

fields.label: Order status to exclude
fields.name: wcra_order_status_to_exclude
fields.instructions: Select which statuses exclude from computation

fields.label: My account page - Display current assigned roles list
fields.name: wcra_my_account_page_display_current_roles_list

fields.label: My account page - Roles to exclude from role list
fields.name: wcra_my_account_page_roles_to_exclude_from_role_list
fields.instructions: Select which roles have not to be displayed in roles list even if they have been asigned to the user.

fields.label: My account page - Display next roles list
fields.name: wcra_my_account_page_display_next_roles_list
fields.instructions: By default in the My Account page, in the Dashboard tab, the plugin displays a list containing all the assignables roles during the current period, how much the user spent to reach them and how much it misses. Select No to disable this feature.

fields.label: Role per Purchased Products rules
fields.name: wcra_products_rules
fields.instructions:
Here you can configure which roles have to be assigned according to the purchased products.

NOTE: Rules are applied top-bottom, so lower rules have higher priority (in case you define more rules for the user role).

sub_fields.label: Rule application policy
sub_fields.name: wcra_skip_rule_application
sub_fields.instructions: Skip this rule application if any previous rule has been already applied.

sub_fields.label: Roles to assign
sub_fields.name: wcra_product_roles_to_assign
sub_fields.instructions: Select which role(s) to assign

sub_fields.label: Remove old role(s) before assign the new one(s)
sub_fields.name: wcra_product_remove_old_roles_before_assign_the_new_ones
sub_fields.instructions: Selecting Yes all the current user roles will be removed and then assigned the selected ones.

sub_fields.label: Role(s) restriction
sub_fields.name: wcra_product_roles_restriction
sub_fields.instructions: You can restrict role assignment selecting to which user role(s) the rules can be applied. Only Customers belonging to that role(s) can be assigned the new role according to the amount spent. Leave unselected to have no restriction.

sub_fields.label: Which roles have to be removed
sub_fields.name: wcra_product_which_roles_have_to_be_removed

sub_fields.label: Select products
sub_fields.name: wcr_selected_products
sub_fields.instructions: If at least one of the selected product is pruchased, the selected roles will be assigned.

sub_fields.label: Select categories
sub_fields.name: wcra_selected_categories
sub_fields.instructions: If at least one of the purchased products belongs to one of the selected categories, the selected roles will be assigned.

sub_fields.label: Products/Category purchase policy
sub_fields.name: wcra_products_relation
sub_fields.instructions:
1. OR: roles will be assigned if at least one of the selected products has been purchased
  2. AND: one of each the selected products has to be purchased. In case of categories selection, there must be in the order one distinct product for each selected category.

sub_fields.label: Quantity policy
sub_fields.name: wcra_quantity_policy
sub_fields.instructions:
1. Ignore: product quantities will be ignored
  2. Number of distinct products: selected roles will be associated only if the user purchases at least N distinct items of the selected products. The value of N can be set through the Quantity value option

sub_fields.label: Quantity value
sub_fields.name: wcra_quantity_value
sub_fields.instructions: Select the number of distinct products

sub_fields.label: Email notification
sub_fields.name: wcra_product_roles_email_notification
sub_fields.instructions: Optionally you can send an email to the user to allowing him to now about the role change.

sub_fields.label: Expiring date type
sub_fields.name: wcra_expiring_date_type
sub_fields.instructions:
Expiring date can be Fixed: in this case the user role will be removed after that date; or Relative: in this case the user role will be removed after the selected time span from the item purchased time.

 

NOTE: After expiring date, roles will be removed and added according to this rule. This mean that if you manually change roles of an user who puchesed the selected items, they will be resetted according this rule after he accesses the site.

sub_fields.label: Role(s) to assign after expiring date
sub_fields.name: wcra_roles_to_assign_after_expiring_date
sub_fields.instructions: It at least one is selected, it will be assigned in addition to the role(s) the customer already has.

sub_fields.label: Remove all roles before assign expring date role(s)
sub_fields.name: wcra_remove_all_roles_before_assign_expring_date_roles
sub_fields.instructions: If you have selected to assign at least one role after expiring date, setting this option to Yes will remove all previous roles befor assigning the new one.

sub_fields.label: Which roles have to be removed
sub_fields.name: wcra_product_which_roles_have_to_be_removed_before_assign_expiring_date

sub_fields.label: Can customers repurchase before expiring date?
sub_fields.name: wcra_repurchase_strategy
sub_fields.instructions:
If Yes is selected, the item(s) expiring date will be extended.

For example, if the relative date has been setted to 3 months and the customer repurchases the item(s), the expiring date will be extended by 3 months

sub_fields.label: Products puchase resriction
sub_fields.name: wcra_purchase_restriction_by_products
sub_fields.instructions:
If the roles selected in the Roles to assign field are still associated to the customer you can optionally deny the purchasing of the following product(s):

NOTE: Leave empty to have no restriction.

fields.label: Role list title
fields.name: wcra_role_list_title
fields.instructions: WPML users can customize title according to language, just switch language using the wpml language selector and enter the text.

fields.label: Next roles list title
fields.name: wcra_next_roles_list_title
fields.instructions: WPML users can customize title according to language, just switch language using the wpml language selector and enter the text.
